title: Website-first clickable live mock (disable PWA features)

requirements.text: Remove/disable Progressive Web App (PWA) behavior so the deliverable is a standard website (no installability, no service worker caching, no offline fallback page experience).

quotes: A complete live mock website (fully clickable demo) i want a website first not PWA

acceptanceCriteria: The site does not register a service worker in production (no /sw.js registration).
frontend/index.html no longer includes PWA-specific metadata/links (at minimum: <link rel='manifest'> and Apple web app meta tags are removed).
The app UI does not show PWA/offline-status UI intended for PWA mode (e.g., OfflineNotice is not rendered).
/manifest.webmanifest and /offline.html are no longer referenced by the app entry HTML or runtime code.

requirements.text: Expand the current landing page into a fully clickable live mock website demo by implementing clickable navigation and call-to-action flows that lead to dedicated on-site sections/pages with real placeholder content (no dead links).

quotes: A complete live mock website (fully clickable demo) i want a website first not PWA

acceptanceCriteria: Primary navigation items and the main CTA buttons all lead somewhere meaningful within the website (either scroll-to sections or routed pages) and do not result in no-op clicks.
If sections are used: each nav item scrolls to an existing section with matching anchor/id, and each section contains non-trivial placeholder content (headings, paragraphs, and at least one action).
If routed pages are used: each nav item changes the view to a dedicated page, and each page contains non-trivial placeholder content and at least one CTA that navigates to another page/section.
No console errors occur when using the navigation and CTAs.

requirements.text: Update site branding and copy to be website-focused (remove 'Web PWA' naming and PWA-centric descriptions from visible UI and document metadata).

quotes: i want a website first not PWA

acceptanceCriteria: The visible header branding text no longer says 'Web PWA'.
frontend/index.html title and meta description are updated to describe a website (not a Progressive Web App).
Any remaining PWA-centric copy in the UI is removed or rewritten to website-centric language.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui and other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths must not be edited directly (compose and reuse them).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; no additional backend services.
Do not introduce third-party auth providers; only Internet Identity is allowed (if auth is used at all).
nonGoals: Adding or restoring PWA functionality (manifest, install prompts, service worker, offline caching, offline fallback page).
Implementing real backend business logic or persistence (this request is for a live mock/clickable demo website).
Integrations with external databases, real-time services, or third-party APIs.

preferencesToAdd: Website-first delivery (no PWA) for initial demo
